name: My Dinopedia VR - Chapter1
description:
VR content that users explore the dinosaur of the Paleozoic Era and perform missions to make their own dinosaur encyclopedia.

Chapter 1 is about the events of the dinosaurs in the canyon.

At this moment, this version is a early access version and Chapter 1 is scheduled to be released in January 2023. If you buy early access version, you can get official version.

Witness giant dinosaur fights!!

Install Method :

1.  Download main file and addition link flie attached with Google Drive.

2. Unpack  main file "MyDinopedia_v1.0.7z" and addtional file.

3. Put additinal file "sharedassets0.assets.resS" into "DinoPedia_Data" folder.

4. Excecute "DinoPedia.exe" with Oculus Rift Mode.
